Topic.Title: Pixie & Moderators - is someone reviewing games to approve?

Posts.EditableText:
I just set my game "Pathfinder" up for review to include in the general searches. It's been a while (over a week) and it's still sitting in Review status. Is someone doing this?

You can find the game here:

https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/3u4a31jgzugluynl8uodlq/pathfinder
